    JAC Recruitment Malaysia Vacancies SALES & MARKETING EXECUTIVE - FOOD MANUFACTURER (REF:AW)

    November 16, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    JAC Recruitment Malaysia is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for SALES & MARKETING EXECUTIVE - FOOD MANUFACTURER (REF:AW) position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    • Position:Sales&Marketing Executive
    • Industry:Food manufacturing industry
    • Working hours : 5 days work
    • Salary:RM 3,500 - 5,000
    • Location:Pasir Gudang,Johor
    JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
    • To follow up distributor/customer by visit them after sales services.
    • To promote existing and new product to distributor/customer by work together with R&D division.
    • Ensure company sales target achieved and maintained.
    • To perform cos,calculate,draft and preparation quotation,submit and follow up wit customer/distributor for feedback.
    • Maintain good relationship with customers,advise them on company services and product.
    • Prepare monthly sales forecast report and estimate sales figure report.
    • Review and revise the contract to customers/distributor and advise management on the contract terms,selling price and etc.
    • Assut other sales team members based on project assignment.
    • Provide marketing information and explain about the marketing pattern in assigned area.
    • Proactive in handling customers/distributors complaint and maintain the customer interest to our company.
    JOB REQUIREMENTS
    • Candidate must possess at least professional diploma or degree its equivalent.
    • At least 3 years of working experience in related field is preferred.
    • Fresh graduate is welcome to apply.
    • Prefer candidate possess sales experience in Food Manufacturing Industry experience before.
    • Candidate must willing to travel and prosess own transport.
    • Strong Analytical, communication and inter-personal skills.
    Junior sales candidate is welcome to apply sales&marketing assistant position !

    Company Overview

    JAC Recruitment was first established in London, UK in 1975. Our growth continue in Asia, where we make our mark in 11 countries: Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand,  Hong Kong, China, Korea, Vietnam, India, United Kingdom and Japan.

    We established since April 1994 in Malaysia and has  been providing accurate and high quality recruitment service to our clients. We introduce highly skilled, experienced and professional personnel, spanning through a wide range of expertise; Executive Placement, Staff Placement, Native Japanese, Japanese Speaking, and Multilingual Talent 
    Emphasizing on quick and efficient solution to your recruitment needs while maintaining a unique, warm Malaysian approach in our communications, assuring a superior quality service that connects employers with employees, fulfilling employment needs in harmonious perfection.
    • Our consultants are well trained professional and has in-depth industry specific knowledge
    • We are committed to provide borderless operation with the same high standard of service everywhere
    • We Place the right talents, to the right positions, at the right companies with joy!

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
